content: At the end of for/open-source/ we should probably mention some open source organisations that use Zulip.(Or maybe link to a page which lists the open source organisations)
This would help the open source maintainers to evaluate how other open source projects use Zulip and decide whether Zulip would be ideal for them.
yeah, definitely something we should do, though might make sense to wait till we have a few higher profile ones.
